description:
Job Description

Monday - Friday

7:00 am - 4:00 pm or 8:00 am - 5:00 pm

Pay $19.00

Responsibilities

  • Be the main point of contact of assigned customers
  • Daily shipping logs
  • Dispatch drivers
  • Calling carriers for status pick up
  • Sending BOL to customers
  • Sending carriers
  • Scheduling pick up for drop trailers
  • Requesting missing BOLs
  • Scanning and emailing
  • Send reports on sales activity, accounts status and possible issues
  • Print of UCC Labels
  • Knowledge of WMS, BOL, and supply chain logistics

RESUME IS NEEDED *** INTERVIEW WILL BE DONE ***

MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE!!

Applications are online. Call or text our office at 909-294-2900.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $19.00 per hour

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Monday to Friday

Experience:

  • Supply chain: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Company Description

Must be able to commute to job site.

Must be able to commute to job site.
